location details.description: The job position is located in Tokyo, specifically in Shibuya-ku, Sendagaya. The office is situated at Agri Square Shinjuku.

remote work details.description: The company offers a 'Wednesday Work from Home Day' where employees can choose between office work and remote work every Wednesday. There's also a Timely Shift System and Monthly Shift System for flexible working arrangements.
The standard work hours are from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
The company offers a complete two-day weekend (Saturday and Sunday), public holidays, New Year's holidays, summer holidays, and paid leave with a usage rate of over 93% (as of March 2023).
The annual salary range is from 5,493,636 yen to 7,687,392 yen.
The company allows casual dress for commuting.
Employees are covered by health insurance, employment insurance, welfare pension, and workers' compensation insurance.
For an example annual salary of 5.49 million yen, the monthly breakdown is: 344,563 yen total, with 268,000 yen base salary, 46,563 yen overtime allowance, and 30,000 yen other allowances.
The company pays for 20 hours of overtime per month regardless of actual overtime worked.
There is a 6-month trial period with no change in conditions during this time.

The company offers various allowances including family allowance, overtime pay, late-night work allowance, holiday work allowance, commuting allowance, relocation allowance, and business trip allowance.
Salary increases occur once a year in May.
Bonuses are paid twice a year, in June and December.

Essential requirements include experience in database design and implementation, and experience in data extraction and manipulation using SQL. smoking prevention details.description: The company has implemented a no-smoking policy indoors as part of their passive smoking prevention measures.
Indoor smoking is prohibited as a measure to prevent passive smoking.

age and gender details.description: The company provides various benefits that consider age and gender, such as maternity leave with a 100% return-to-work rate, childcare leave, and family allowance for children up to 18 years old. They also offer nursing care leave for children and a babysitter subsidy system.
